duties_responsibilities.duty: Travel through assigned areas to call on accounts and check inventory for delivery needs.
Communicate with customers, maintain on-site daily product reporting and analysis.
Source, upsell, and build relationships with existing and potential customers.
Provide daily support of sales efforts and account maintenance functions.
Ensure actual inventory count, communicate with warehouse personnel, and enter orders to support e-commerce solutions.

education_certification.credential: High school degree or equivalent required. 1-2 years of experience in electrical, construction, or mechanical products, resolving technical, equipment, and service-related issues.
